channel.title: Shayô: Anyone Know about This?
channel.description: [Shayô](http://www.legrog.org/jeux/shayo) is a weird, samurai-post apocalyptic fusion rpg from 7ème Cercle. (http://www.legrog.org/editeurs/7eme-cercle) A couple of years ago at Gen Con they were advertising a forthcoming English language version (or at least a Kickstarter for one). That seems to have vanished. I know that Cubicle 7 split with them and dropped supporting their English-language translated lines. But I'd like to know if there's more to the story. You can't even find the digital, French version of Shayô on DTRPG.
